jdbcService.sql: select u.id, u.created, u.modified, null, null, u.password_modified, u.alias, u.verification_code, u.invites_left, u.blocked_since, u.anonymous, u.realm, n.started, n.stopped, n.verified, n.enabled, null from users u join nodes n on u.id = n.id where (:name is null or u.alias ilike '%' || :name || '%') and (:ids is null or u.id = any(:ids))
